uid.description: Unique identifier of the dashboardWidget object

app_code_name.description: The code name of the app that owns this token

token.description: The JWS token that is used to authenticate the staff member to the app. The token is signed by the app's private key and can be verified by the app's public key it contains information about the staff member, the actor generating the token and the app

expiry_date.description: The date and time the token will expire

created_at.description: The date and time the token was created

description: A comapct JWS token object that is used to authenticate a staff member to an inTandem app using a JWKS proecess. The token is signed by the app's private key and can be verified by the inTandem platform's public key
